## farthestPointSegment variable

Returns the index of the start point containing the segment in the polyline array `points` farthest away from `p` with regards to the line segment `a` to `b`<!-- -->. `points` is only checked between indices `from` and `to` (not including the latter).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
farthestPointSegment: (a: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, b: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, points: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>[], from?: number, to?: number) => number[]
```
